Print a species_mix model object.

print.species_mix.Rd

Print a species_mix model object.

# S3 method for species_mix
print(x, ...)

Arguments

x

A model object.
\dots

Ignored

Examples


#Print information about a species_mix model
# \donttest{
library(ecomix)
set.seed(42)
sam_form <- stats::as.formula(paste0('cbind(',paste(paste0('spp',1:20),
collapse = ','),")~x1+x2"))
sp_form <- ~ 1
beta <- matrix(c(-2.9,-3.6,-0.9,1,.9,1.9),3,2,byrow=TRUE)
dat <- data.frame(y=rep(1,100),x1=stats::runif(100,0,2.5),
x2=stats::rnorm(100,0,2.5))
dat[,-1] <- scale(dat[,-1])
simulated_data <- species_mix.simulate(archetype_formula = sam_form,species_formula = sp_form,
data = dat,beta=beta,family="bernoulli")

#> Random alpha from normal (-1,0.5) distribution
fm1 <- species_mix(archetype_formula = sam_form,species_formula = sp_form,
data = simulated_data, family = 'bernoulli',  nArchetypes=3)

#> SAM modelling
#> There are 3 archetypes to group the species into
#> There are 100 site observations for 20 species
#> The model for the archetype (grouping) is ~x1 + x2
#> The model for the species is ~1
#> You are implementing a bernoulli Species Archetype Model.
#> Using ECM algorithm to find starting values; using 1refits
#> ECM restart 1 of 1
#> Initialising starting values
#> Initial groups parameter estimates by K-means clustering with random noise
#> Iteration:  1 | New loglik -967.597 | Ratio loglik 0 
#> Iteration:  2 | New loglik -841.415 | Ratio loglik 0.8695924 
#> Iteration:  3 | New loglik -841.416 | Ratio loglik 1 
#> initial  value 841.774554 
#> iter  10 value 820.166958
#> iter  20 value 819.991654
#> final  value 819.991358 
#> converged
print(fm1)# }

#> bernoulli species_mix model
#> 
#> Mixing probabilities
#> [1] 0.25 0.40 0.35
#> 
#> Coefficents
#> $alpha
#>       spp1       spp2       spp3       spp4       spp5       spp6       spp7 
#> -0.8012006 -1.6332276 -0.5742766 -1.0837098 -1.0163191 -1.1726821 -0.7324572 
#>       spp8       spp9      spp10      spp11      spp12      spp13      spp14 
#> -1.2026761 -1.6395815 -0.1855601 -0.8561942 -1.3900698 -0.7008558 -0.7008558 
#>      spp15      spp16      spp17      spp18      spp19      spp20 
#> -0.8923384 -0.3776552 -1.3841784 -1.0540714 -1.2026761 -0.4294028 
#> 
#> $beta
#>                    x1        x2
#> Archetype1 -2.9039207 -3.543070
#> Archetype2 -0.8297854  0.954712
#> Archetype3  0.9910608  1.986260
#> 
#> $eta
#>       eta1       eta2 
#> -0.3629055  0.1847341 
#>
